text:
Hi everyone,

does anyone know if it’s possible to change the default 12 column layout grid of HubSpot’s dnd areas?
I know it’s possible to change the width of each span1-12 with layout.css but I’m looking to make a 5 column layout with equal column width work in a dnd area which doesn’t add up with 12 columns in total.

Is there a way to make it a 10 column grid or will i have to make a custom module that’s not relying on the dnd layout grid?
